text: Thomas Edison received a patent for the kinetographic camera, the forerunner of the motion picture film projector.
Stockholders approved the merger of Aldus Corp. and Adobe Systems Inc. It united the two driving forces behind desktop publishing software. Aldus Pagemaker became Adobe Pagemaker.
The developer release of Apple's new OS, code name Grail1Z4 / Titan1U was released. It was known formally as Rhapsody and would evolve into OS X..
